name: Heart of the North
description:
Heart of The North

Developed by a single person in 2 months. All game assests were created by me except music and sfx's.

Type: 2D Platformer Adventure Game

Theme : Viking Warrior Seeking Revenge

Timeline : 2 Months

Art : Pixel Art

Music : Alexander Nakarada

CONTROLS

W-S : Climb Ladder

A-D : Left-Right Movement

F : Dash

Space : Jump

Shift : Little Jump

X : Use Ulti

Left Click : Throw Axe

Right Click : Melee Attack

ESC : Pause Game

M : Market
